column6:
"IN THE BEGINNING" pts. 1 & 2
Garth Ennis finally lets loose to take Punisher to the MAX - literally - as the hunter becomes the hunted! No more pulled punches, no more dialing it down. One of comics' most provocative writers takes one of comics' most provocative characters in a new direction - ANY direction he wants!
32 PGS. (each)/PARENTAL ADVISORY...$2.99 (each)
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Lewis Larosa | inker:Tom Palmer
